did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Records of the national organization. Includes flower judging contest records and photographs, 1978-1986, and copies of Lotus Leaflets (newsletter).

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Records of the national organization. Includes flower judging contest records and photographs, 1978-1986, and copies of Lotus Leaflets (newsletter).

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Pi Alpha Xi records, #4379. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.
